org.zeromq.api.exception

Class ContextTerminatedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.zeromq.ZMQException
            • org.zeromq.api.exception.ZMQRuntimeException
              • org.zeromq.api.exception.ContextTerminatedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ContextTerminatedException
extends ZMQRuntimeException
    Thrown to indicate the context has been terminated. This exception directly maps to the ETERM error code in libzmq.
    Author:
    sjohnr
    See Also:
